name: Xilinx ISE Project File
summary: Learn about .XISE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The ".xise" extension was introduced with ISE version 11 software. Versions 7 through 10 use the .ISE extension, and ISE 5 and 6 use the .NPL extension.

description: Project file created by ISE, an application used for designing computer hardware electronics devices; saves a list of the source files used by the project as well as project properties and the software version for the project; used for FPGA (Field-programmable Gate Array) design.
